name: Arcade Time
overview: The heroes of the most famous videogames, after completing their missions, joined forces, founded the h.r.g. (hero rebel group) and have conquered the coin-op world. Among the main exponents of the group are: Commando, Vaus, Goblins, Bub & Bob, Tiger Shark, Mario, Jack, Rygar, Pac-Man. Their leader and current coin-op emperor is unknown. You, in the role of Ryu, a renegade of H.R.G., moved away after learning of their evil plans, and have decided to fight them You are alone, armed with your ax and your shield and... with your courage. To free the coin-op world you must first vanquish the enemy hordes present on its 4 natural satellites governed in order by: Commando, Vaus, Goblins and Bub & Bob, then launch the decisive attack on the planet in search of the emperor. On your way you will find, in addition to enemies, objects and people to be brought to safety. for example: prisoners, capsules, armor, crowns and joysticks that have been lost by your enemies. Once you reach the emperor, it is your job to try and kill him. Good luck, you will need it !!! Created using the Shoot 'em up Construction Kit.
